All Classes

Class Description
Accuracy<T>
Metric class that calculates the classification accuracy, given two generic arrays: predicted and expected classes.
Bayes
Implementation of a tree augmented naive Bayes classifier (TAN).
Classifier
Service that provides the classifier.
F1Score<T>
Metric class that calculates the F1 score, given two generic arrays: predicted and expected classes.
FileClass
Reads a training or test file into an Integer Matrix, also calculates the maximum of each set of features.
FileInterface
Service dedicated to handle files to be processed.
Graph
Generates a graph with accessible nodes.
GraphClass
Generates a graph which nodes are accessible and implement two score models, MDL and LL.
IDTranslator
Translator of classes into IDs (positive integers including zero).
Main
Main class of the application.
MetricAbstract<T>
Abstract metric, that offers some useful functions, such as sortClasses() and toString() for formatting the results presentation, and attributes, that can be commonly shared by different implementations of metrics.
Metrics<T>
Service that provides the evaluation of generic classifications.
Node
Service that provides a representation of a node.
NodeAbstract
Abstract implementation of the Node interface.
It defines some attributes and constructors and gives the implementation of certain methods that are the same for every type of node.
NodeLL
Implementation of the node using the log-likelihood (LL) score to compute the value of the Alphas.
NodeMDL
Implementation of the node using the minimum description length (MDL) score to compute the value of the Alphas.
Resume
Encapsulates all available metrics into a single object, acting like a "remote control" of the metrics.
Sensitivity<T>
Metric class that calculates the sensitivity, given two generic arrays: predicted and expected classes.
Specificity<T>
Metric class that calculates the specificity, given two generic arrays: predicted and expected classes.
TComparator<T>
Utility comparator for generic type T, useful for sorting algorithms.
Translator
For generalisation purposes, classes will be converted into arrays of integers.
Tree
Generates a tree (graph) with accessible nodes.
TreeClass
Generates a tree (graph) implemented as an adjacency matrix with accessible nodes.
